### say_hello

>  say_hello (to)

*Say hello to somebody*

``` python
say_hello("Isaac")
```

    'Hello Isaac!'

``` python
assert say_hello("Hamel") == "Hello Hamel!"
```

``` python
from fastcore.test import *
```

``` python
test_eq(say_hello("Hamel"), "Hello Hamel!")
```

from IPython.display import display,SVG
